snippet: Airstrikes on Iraq were a fairly easy sell, but airstrikes on the group in Syria present a dilemma: how to support such military action while obeying international law.
abstract: News analysis; American airstrikes on Iraq were an easy sell because Baghdad government had requested assistance, but airstrikes on Islamic State in Syria present dilemma of how to support such military action while obeying international law.
lead_paragraph: Airstrikes on Iraq were a fairly easy sell, but airstrikes on the group in Syria present a dilemma: how to support such military action while obeying international law.

headline.main: A Host of Possible Objections to Expanded Airstrikes in Syria
headline.print_headline: A Host of Possible Objections to Expanded Airstrikes
